name: John P. PERAZZO, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Perazzo v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: John P. PERAZZO, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 30th day of January, 2013, the above captioned appeal is quashed for failure to file a brief.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
61 A.3d 191
John P. PERAZZO, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 2 MAP 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 30, 2013.
